meanings.definition: The quality of being manageable or easy to handle.
meanings.sent1: The manageablenesses of the task made it simple to complete.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the manageablenesses of this project.
meanings.sent3: The manageablenesses of the situation made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor added manageablenesses to the chaotic room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's clear instructions increased the manageablenesses of the assignment.

meanings.definition: The state of being able to be controlled or dealt with effectively.
meanings.sent1: The manageablenesses of the budget allowed for smooth planning.
meanings.sent2: We need to ensure the manageablenesses of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The manageablenesses of the puppy training session surprised us all.
meanings.sent4: His leadership skills brought manageablenesses to the team dynamics.
meanings.sent5: The manageablenesses of the schedule kept everything on track.
